text:
Maziyar Jobrani (; born February 26, 1972) is an Iranian-American comedian and actor. He was born in Tehran. He is known for being part of the "Axis of Evil" comedy group.
His best known movies are "The Interpreter", "Friday After Next", "Dragonfly", and '. He appeared as a regular character on the 2017 CBS sitcom "Superior Donuts".
